titleStmt.title: Melchisedek. Concio de æterno Christi sacerdotio, in visitatione cathedrali tou makaritou Sethi Episcopi Sarisburiensis, habita. Per Josephum Kelsey ejusdem ecclesiæ præbendarium.
titleStmt.author: Kelsey, Joseph, d. 1710.

titleStmt.title: Melchisedek. Concio de æterno Christi sacerdotio, in visitatione cathedrali tou makaritou Sethi Episcopi Sarisburiensis, habita. Per Josephum Kelsey ejusdem ecclesiæ præbendarium.
titleStmt.author: Kelsey, Joseph, d. 1710.

publicationStmt.publisher: Impensis Gualteri Kettilby, ad insigne Capitis Episcopalis in Cœmeterio D. Pauli.,

notesStmt.note: The first word of the title, and the two words preceding "Sethi", are transliterated from the Greek.
With an initial leaf of imprimatur and a final leaf of advertisement.
Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
